answers.answer: He is an idiot.....sorry but why cant these men understand importance of bday or holidays.

I completely understand!!!!! My 14 y/o daughter has been acting out stressing me the hell out...hubby working my nerve....I cant even enjoy my damn pregnancy. ..I could say some very hurtful things and im trying not to but being pregnant is stressful enough!!!! I could have vented in a whole diff direction....but ill make this as nice as possible. ..

Awwww :( that does suck. It would suck to be around a Scrooge even if you didn't have all that other stuff going on! I would just decorate and do the Christmas things that make you happy with your daughter and don't even try to include him if he's not into it. I know it probably hurts but that's the best you can do. He should be bending over backwards for you right now but you can't force him to. Why doesn't he want to be in the OR with you when you have the baby?

So glad i aint the only one who gettin they nerves worked. He says hell get sick. He doesnt wanna see the baby all gross or see the surgery actually happening. Ive tried to tell him we will be behind a sheet n shell be cleaned up n wrapped up befor we see her. But hes so damn hardheaded im done tryin to get him to be there. He can stay home for all i care right now. I was alone with my first daughter i can do it again now that i know what to expect n have more experience about being a mother.

About the baby being born: when hes at the hospital with you, say something to the doctor about how upset you are that he doesn't want to go in. The doctor will explain that he wont see anything he doesn't want to.  And it doesnt make you look like the bad guy for nagging him :) I have a hubby who is equally as stubborn and can I tell him something (regarding medical issue), but he wont believe me until he hears it from a professionals mouth.And put the tree up where you want it and he can be a bloody grump on his own :)

That's so inconsiderate, hope you get the birthday you want, just isn't fair when your partner is against whats important to you,.. But try letting him calm and speaking calmly about why these thing are important to you ad y they should b important to him

Men make me so sick. All the things we have to go through and they don't have to do anything! He's going to feel sick seein the baby after they take it out? What about you? You have been going through daily discomforts and hardships for the last nine months! And it's YOUR body that they are doing the surgery on, not his! Seriously, , the least he can do is be there. And if he misses that first moment when his child is brought into this world he is going to regret it for the rest of his life

Thank you ladies. I actually have a friend who is checking on a tree for me. If she has it ill have it tomorrow so im kinda excited. Im just trying to forget bout everything hes saying n deal with everything one day at a time. I think i might talk to the dr on the 20th n make him go in with me so he can hear it from the dr. I wish men had to go through everything we go through. I told him he couldnt last 9 months being pregnant. He said he could.  Id like to see him go 9 months carrying a baby with fibromyalgia and high risk for preeclampsia n any other problems that could happen or diseases that ppl deal with on a daily pregnant or not

that's what I'm talking about if it was a man the world would have never evolved I won't even know how we evolve in the beginning, because I am telling you birth labor pregnancy ***** in you know what !!!!!!!!! we do it over and over and over again like it's not **** ....well it ***** the only reason we do it again because the end reslut is worth it ....forget all about it me have no idea how hard it is to carry a baby ...and sometimes we fail......and have t o try again. .....and that's the worst because u will always worry until u die .....good luck he will come around .....

question: I posted the other day bout my other half refusing to be in the OR with me. Ive been preping myself to be alone. Well he ruined everything for me today. Im the type of person who hates holidays. I was finally gettin in the christmas spirit n wantin to do a lil tree n some other christmas stuff. He wants to be the scrooge n wants a lil 3ft white spiral outdoor tree for in the house cuz it just folds up. I said no its not goin to happen. So he starts talkin bout how he hates holidays n hates christmas n christmas is just another way to waste money. I told him to go somewhere else with that. My freakin birthday is on christmas. And my daughters is the day after. N im having a c section on the 27. He better start liking christmas....im so mad i wanna cry n actually sittin here trying to hold them back. Grrr if it aint one thing its another
title: Venting in a real $hitty mood
